description.value:
You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks and to their DCs against Athletics skill actions such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Disarm]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Shove]{Shove}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Song of Strength]{Spell Effect: Song of Strength}

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Inspire Heroics]{Inspire Heroics} composition spell, you can use that composition to improve the bonus granted by song of strength in the same way as Inspire Courage or Inspire Defense.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Strength, +2)]{Success on Inspire Heroics}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Strength, +3)]{Critical success on Inspire Heroics}
